outputs.output_descr: Help reduce poverty and increase employment rates through; (i) the usage of ICT to strengthen an information society that is capable of absorbing and benefiting from the massive flow of information; (ii) supporting community development; (iii) encouraging youth to utilize ICTs for peace enhancement; (iv) supporting the development of Arabic e-Content; and, (v) establishing specialized community development portals.
outputs.output_title: ICT to Foster Egypt Phase II

outputs.output_descr: Address the mismatch between private sector skills demands and women and men youth skills sets by providing youth with the necessary vocational training in IT and soft skills to increase their employment prospects, by providing young people with technical and financial support to establish their own businesses, and by setting up a mechanism to connect private sector companies and young men and women in view of increasing their chances to access internship opportunities and enter the job market.

project_descr: ICT to Foster Egypt's Sustainable Human Development: Phase II
project_title: Technology to Foster Human Development in Egypt: PhaseII
